articles.description: Liverpudlian actress Jodie Comer has taken the UK box office by storm as figures show the onscreen release of her one-woman play Prima Facie took at least £1.4million on its opening day.
articles.content:
Jodie Comer may have revived the UK cinema slump after the big-screen showing of her one-woman play smashed the box office.
